Articles.Content:
I don't know what you guys call yourselves - Kerballi, Kerbalites? Kerblish? Kerbalistani? Anyways, hey there.

Found my way here from... actually I don't remember. I had a few beers the other day and found the demo on my desktop this morning. Had a quick fiddle around with that and took the Ã‚Â£10 plunge so I can crack on with strapping little green men to even bigger and more spectacular deathtraps.

Really looking forward to seeing what you guys do with it next and I expect I'll have a lengthening list of questions/pile of torn out hair after a couple of days. In the meantime, have the undertakers on standby and carry a thick umbrella!

Perihelion

Hi Perihelion, welcome to the community

You can see what is coming up in this thread, though no English style fog and rain yet to help us feel more at home, but at least with the new planets we can do re-enactments of the Beagle landing, don't forget to not open the parachute
Haha, I will be fervently working on my space piloting... ready to plough face first where no Kerbal has ever crashed before. Some .17 features are looking good!
